landing_page.subtitle: Explore build automation solutions for your Godot projects.

feature_promotion_1.title: Automate CI/CD process
feature_promotion_1.subtitle: Unlock the power of continuous integration and continuous delivery without the hassle of complex setup processes. Our CI/CD pipeline is designed with simplicity and ease of integration in mind, enabling you to streamline your development workflow effortlessly.

feature_promotion_2.title: Scale build infrastructure to your need
feature_promotion_2.subtitle: Empower your development team to innovate and scale without limitations. With our platform, you can effortlessly scale your build infrastructure to match your evolving needs, ensuring optimal performance and efficiency at every stage of your development lifecycle.

key_features.title: Key features
key_features.subtitle: Develop games faster by optimizing CI/CD pipeline and developement process.

feature_1.title: Productivity
feature_1.description: Automate boring, repetitive tasks by integrating CI/CD piepline into your projects.

feature_2.title: Reduced downtime
feature_2.description: Allow developers to build projects in consistent and reproducible build environment outside of their personal workspace.

feature_3.title: Scalability
feature_3.description: Scale build infrastructure according to your needs. Build your Godot projects in parallel for different platforms.

feature_4.title: Enhanced game quality
feature_4.description: Increase quality of your games by frequent builds and automated tests, allowing for faster bug fixes.

feature_5.title: Collaboration
feature_5.description: Get notification on build status and new releases. Promote communication and code reviews in centrilized platform which provides detailed logs and audit trails of deployments.

feature_6.title: Cost efficiency
feature_6.description: Reduce infrastructure costs. Pay only for what you need.

articles.title: Articles
articles.subtitle: Discover the power of our innovative solutions and elevate your developement experience.

article_1.title: Benefits of build servers
article_1.description: Learn about the adventages of using build servers in development process.

article_2.title: Automated deployments
article_2.description: Explore how automated deployments can elevate game quality.

article_3.title: Get feedback, improve communication
article_3.description: Improve teamwork and communication by getting build feedback and error alerts.
